title: oggnalive
author: oggnalive
created_time: July 28, 2023, 01:21:06 AMLast edit: August 01, 2023, 05:57:08 AM by oggnalive
content: "Economy creation by digital communities free and without distinction"https://www.oggnalive.comhttps://explorer.oggnalive.com/https://github.com/oggnalive/ogg/releases/tag/v1.0.0Hello Bitcoin community.We created the oggnalive cryptocurrency (OGG), it's a Bitcoin (BTC)-like currency, we created it to monetize digital communities.We are entering a new era of Blockchain, as far as cryptocurrencies and P2P relationships are concerned, a few years ago we did not imagine that this would be possible and that cryptocurrencies would become so popular, in addition to the change of aspect in relation to developers that sometimes become many pseudonyms, of course this can be due to political, ideological persecution or to commit fraud, anything is possible, but the basis for trust are the codes that form the currency and the blockchain system.Our currency has a centralized origin but operates in a 100% decentralized way, we want to convey trust and purpose and not just something short term and we don't see it as a currency that will replace Bitcoin (BTC) I believe so virtually unlikely that any currency will replace BTC and ETH for their legitimate purposes.The function and purpose of (OGG) is to be a currency to nurture our platform and monetize users in addition to making the cryptocurrency market more complete by adding value to users and communities, not just limiting our platform, we want to promote it as a decentralized currency. It will be used for purchases, payments and advertising.We have pre-mined 1,000,000 OGG units to feed faucets, give away at events, pay affiliates and do marketing and goal promoting. But beyond that, there's still OGG mining 1,000,000 units.Totaling OGG 2,000,000 units.My name is Alym Wehrli, I live in Brazil, I'm the developer, CEO, CJO, CTO of this project. I was born and raised in poverty, in the past I developed some "chitcoin" in addition to being in decentralized projects as a coordinator and leader, I'm horrible at programming, but I have strong values, I want to do something for myself, for the community and for people to be remunerated with the use of platforms, social networks and other things on the internet and I see that oggnalive (OGG) serves this purpose, we are in the beta stage, I paid for a lower cost server I am doing this project with some freelancers and with some people on the internet. We need help putting it on an exchange. I have company in Brazil and we are opening a Corp in the USA, in the future I will talk about the challenges and difficulties.Thank you all for your time and if possible help us to make this project happen.Coin propertiesAlgorithm: 25.0 SHA-256 Proof of Work Coin name: oggnaliveSymbol: OGGPublic address letter: GCoin unit: ggPort: RPCBlock reward: 1 coinsCoin supply:2000000 coinsPremine: 1000000 coinsAdvanced propertiesblock time: 30 secondsDiff time: 30 secondsmaturity: 100 blockshttps://liberapay.com/oggna/https://twitter.com/oggnalive
